query.query:
query {
  DocumentaryUnit(id: "a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-1234-567890abcdef") {
    id
    description {
      archivistNote
      name
      physicalCharacteristics
      archivalHistory
      acquisition
      appraisal
      accruals
      biographicalHistory
      conditionsOfAccess
      conditionsOfReproduction
      datesOfDescriptions
      extentAndMedium
      levelOfDescription
      relatedUnitsOfDescription
      publicationNote
      ref
      rulesAndConventions
      scopeAndContent
      separatedUnitsOfDescription
      systemOfArrangement
      findingAids
      languageOfMaterial
      locationOfOriginals
      locationOfCopies
      parallelFormsOfName
      physicalLocation
      notes
      scriptOfMaterial
      sources
      unitDates
    }
  }
}

query {
  DocumentaryUnit(id: "a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-1234-567890abcdef") {
    id
    description {
      name
      languageCode
      archivistNote
      archivalHistory
      acquisition
      appraisal
      accruals
      biographicalHistory
      conditionsOfAccess
      conditionsOfReproduction
      datesOfDescriptions
      extentAndMedium
      levelOfDescription
      relatedUnitsOfDescription
      physicalCharacteristics
      publicationNote
      ref
      rulesAndConventions
      scopeAndContent
      separatedUnitsOfDescription
      systemOfArrangement
    }
  }
}
